endpoints.description: Retrieve the overall health and status of the grid infrastructure.
Submit a detailed report of an identified anomaly in the grid.
Fetch detailed health and operational data of a specific substation by its identifier.
Update configuration settings for a specific transformer.
List all monitored transmission lines with their current statuses.
Mark a specific sensor as under maintenance.
Access historical data of detected anomalies for trend analysis.
Remove a specific alert from the system by its identifier.
Subscribe to real-time notifications for specific criteria.
Visualize the current topology of the grid network.
